commandobject.name: Trace
commandobject.documentation: Will send a ray from specified location to specified destination, responds with TRC message. TRACE uses Trace function - slower then FastTrace function, but provides more information about collision.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Message Id made up by you and echoed in response so you can match up response with query.

property.name: From
property.documentation: Origin point of the ray. If you won't support From attribute, current bot location will be taken as From.

property.name: TraceActors
property.documentation: When true it means that all actors will be traced â€“ for example players, bots, monsters, items etc. in a game. With TraceActors false we trace just level geometry.
